Title: Requires practitioners who administer naloxone or another overdose reversal agent to a patient to report the administration of the agent to the prescription monitoring program registry
Summary: Requires practitioners who administer naloxone or another overdose reversal agent to a patient in the case of a suspected or confirmed overdose to report the administration of the agent to the prescription monitoring program registry.
LawCode: Amd ยง3343-a, Pub Health L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the public health law, in relation to requiring practitioners who administer naloxone or another overdose reversal agent to a patient in the case of a suspected or confirmed overdose to report the administration of the agent to the prescription monitoring program registry
